definition[0]: to arrange for something important to start, such as an official process or a new plan
example[0]: They have decided to initiate legal proceedings against the newspaper.
example[1]: Intellectuals have initiated a debate on terrorism.
definition[1]: to tell someone about something or show them how to do something
example[2]: Those kids were initiated into heroin use at a young age.
definition[2]: to introduce someone into an organization, club, group etc, usually with a special ceremony
example[3]: At the age of thirteen, the boys in the tribe are initiated into manhood.
definition[3]: someone who has been allowed to join a particular organization, club, or group and has been taught its secrets
